acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This printed material was given to the Library by Kendon Stubbs, Alderman Library, on October 24, 1992.

processinfo.p: Funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of the American Rhododendron Societyconsists of forty-five printed items, chiefly rhododendron nursery catalogs in the United States, Great Britain, Canada, and India, ca. 1925-1984, and foreign articles concerning the cultivation of rhododendrons, ca. 1977-1986, and undated.
